mapper.select: SELECT company_email AS companyEmail, company_kor_name AS companyKorName, company_Eng_name AS companyEngName, account_kind AS accountKind , company_password AS companyPw FROM (SELECT member_email, member_name, account_kind, member_password FROM dev_member UNION SELECT admin_email, admin_name, account_kind, admin_password FROM dev_admin UNION SELECT company_email, company_kor_name, account_kind, company_password FROM dev_company)e WHERE member_email=#{memberEmail}
mapper.insert: insert into dev_company ( company_email, company_password,company_kor_name,company_eng_name,company_address, company_phone,company_date) values( #{companyEmail}, PASSWORD(#{companyPw}), #{companyKorName}, #{companyEngName}, #{companyAddress}, #{companyPhone}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(t.cnt) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM dev_company WHERE company_kor_name=#{companyKorName}) t
